mapper.insert: insert into blog (author_id, title, preview, status, release_time, type, course_id, video_id, chapter_id, chapter_order) values (#{authorId}, #{title}, #{preview}, #{status}, #{releaseTime}, #{type}, #{courseId}, #{videoId}, #{chapterId}, #{chapterOrder})
mapper.update: update course_chapter set course_id = #{courseId}, chapter_order = #{chapterOrder}, title = #{title}, desc = #{desc}, chapter_id = #{chapterId} where chapter_id = #{chapterId}
update blog set title = #{title}, preview = #{preview}, video_id = #{videoId}, chapter_order = #{chapterOrder}, id = #{id} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from course where course_id = #{courseId} and author_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from course where course_id = #{id} and author_id = #{userId}
